about_the_game:
"Magic Tower (Destroy the Wormhole)" is a tower-climbing fixed-value strategy RPG game.
The alien devils light-years away invaded the human planet through the wormhole. The human alliance sent the chosen warrior to climb to the top of the magic tower to destroy the invasion channel of the devils, and the warrior is the role played by the player.

Game Features
· The number of levels is moderate. For experienced players, the overall clearance time is about 4 hours
· Only need to acquire a specific item once to display all secret passages
· Over 40 unique monsters
· 7 unique scripture, you can also obtain powerful skills after successful cultivation
· Some weapons provide specific skills
· Use Gold Attack to instantly kill most types of monsters, and it is a solution when encountering difficulties

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 740M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Use English install path

short_description: Magic Tower (Destroy the Wormhole) is a fixed value strategy game. Similar to the gameplay of the classic magic tower, on this basis, new gameplay, rich skills and prop types are added. Players can choose different routes to train the role.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
